name: The Way Life Works (Incomplete)
description:
Jaden Manro is a popular high school junior. He's  super smart, athletic, and has all the girls falling for him. After his parents' death though, all his wants is to be left alone. Between his childhood friend, Monica; her best friend Crystal; his fan girl Sabri;  and the new girl Heaven; He may never get the alone time he wants. Play as Jaden in this Slice of Life/Romance with multiple ending. Will you end up with your favorite girl? Or will you give Jaden the alone time he want by pushing others away? The choice is yours, but remember, each choice has  "two sides".

(This game is meant for a mature audience. It contains sensitive subjects such as Abuse, Racism, Depression, Suicide, ect. Player discretion adviced.)
